title: GAME CRASH- didn't even join a game lol
body: Hello i opened up LoL and logged in, just as i logged in a screen comes up telling me my game has crashed with a button saying "attempt to reconnect" although i never joined a game and when i try connect i get an error saying that "it has failed to connect" this has happened multiple times and i dont understand why, i may be hacked and have lost rp for no reason in the past but. honestly this is ridiculous because i never joined a game in the first place. it says logging onto chat server aswell after i log in so i know its not the server. or i might be. im not that tech savy please respond asap as it also gives me msg warning me of ban for leaving A GAME I NEVER JOINED{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: fixed itself, riot magic. but should keep post up for an answer for future knowledge and other players help :3
